easy.name: Weak Goblin
easy.description: A small, cowardly goblin with rusty weapons

easy.name: Cave Rat
easy.description: A large, aggressive rat with glowing red eyes
easy.victory_message: The rat squeaks and scurries away defeated!

easy.name: Skeleton Warrior
easy.description: An animated skeleton wielding ancient weapons

medium.name: Orc Raider
medium.description: A brutish orc warrior with scarred armor
medium.victory_message: The orc roars in defeat and retreats!

medium.name: Shadow Beast
medium.description: A creature of living darkness with glowing eyes

medium.name: Stone Golem
medium.description: A massive construct of animated stone and magic
medium.victory_message: The golem's magic fades and it becomes lifeless stone!

hard.name: Fire Elemental
hard.description: A being of pure flame that radiates intense heat
hard.victory_message: The flames die down to mere embers!

hard.name: Dark Knight
hard.description: A fallen paladin in blackened armor, wielding cursed weapons
hard.victory_message: The dark knight's curse is broken and he finds peace!

hard.name: Ancient Dragon
hard.description: A massive, ancient dragon with scales like armor and breath like fire
hard.victory_message: The mighty dragon acknowledges your strength and yields!

hard.name: Demon Lord
hard.description: A powerful demon from the depths of the underworld
hard.victory_message: The demon lord is banished back to the abyss!

boss.name: Labyrinth Guardian
boss.description: The ancient guardian of the labyrinth's deepest secrets
boss.victory_message: The guardian bows in respect and grants you passage!

combat_scenarios.description: You hear a rustling in the shadows. Suddenly, {enemy_name} leaps out to attack!
{enemy_name} stands guard, blocking your path forward.
You've entered {enemy_name}'s territory. It prepares to defend its domain!
{enemy_name} protects a valuable treasure. It won't let you pass without a fight!
